item.title: 由于彩票销售火爆，周五的百万大奖奖金增加了 2300 万美元。
item.description:
Nearly $815 million is on the line in Friday night's Mega Millions jackpot drawing.

The prize grew $23 million on Friday due to strong ticket sales. https://t.co/wan7uQikfK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 社交媒体平台 TikTok 处于被迫出售的边缘，因为众议院周三通过了一项措施，除非 TikTok 与其中资母公司字节跳动分道扬镳，否则将禁止该应用。
item.description:
Social media platform TikTok stands on the brink of a forced sale after the House passed a measure on Wednesday that would ban the app unless it parts ways with its Chinese-owned parent company, ByteDance. https://t.co/cPdPp80f6g pic.twitter.com/jy0ztc5bMw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：布鲁克林检察官办公室表示，不会对周四纽约地铁枪击案中的 32 岁嫌疑人提出指控，理由是 "自卫"。
item.description:
LATEST: The Brooklyn DA's Office said it will not be charging the 32-year-old suspect involved in the New York City subway shooting that left one person critically injured Thursday, citing "self-defense." https://t.co/bEueCZZIQI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当局正在调查一名在纳什维尔失踪的青少年是否在乡村歌手卢克-布莱恩（Luke Bryan）拥有的一家当地酒吧被过度招待。
item.description:
Authorities are investigating whether a teen who went missing in Nashville was overserved at a local bar owned by country singer Luke Bryan. https://t.co/vhPJAhAN3x pic.twitter.com/Qff9RYeRnv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州酒精饮料委员会表示，它正在调查失踪大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在纳什维尔夜游失踪前是否被超量饮酒。
item.description:
The Tennessee Alcoholic Beverage Commission said it is investigating whether missing college student Riley Strain was overserved before he vanished during a night out in Nashville. https://t.co/xJS1659JYF pic.twitter.com/t9FM9xAKLz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 司法部宣布，蒙大拿州一名男子承认在 "大胆计划 "中对巨型杂交绵羊进行基因工程改造并将其出售给狩猎机构。
item.description:
Montana man pleads guilty to genetically engineering giant hybrid sheep in "audacious scheme" to sell the species to hunting facilities, DOJ announces. https://t.co/k3Z3TKMAo1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 周五晚上的 "兆彩 "头奖抽奖将产生近 8 亿美元的奖金，在连续 27 次抽奖无一中奖之后，大奖奖金将不断膨胀。
item.description:
Nearly $800 million is on the line in Friday night's Mega Millions jackpot drawing, with the grand prize ballooning after 27 consecutive drawings without a winner. https://t.co/nDzTStJP7L

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 印第安纳州一位看似健康的母亲在多米尼加共和国度假后死于回国的航班上，最新披露的尸检报告证实，她的猝死与犯规行为无关。
item.description:
A newly revealed autopsy report for a seemingly healthy Indiana mom who died on a flight home after vacationing in the Dominican Republic has confirmed that no foul play was involved in her sudden death. https://t.co/3KTtDLnT0f pic.twitter.com/AHv3w0vP9Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：前总统特朗普的律师正在寻求推迟其纽约封口费案的开庭时间，以便他们能够审查司法部最近披露的数万页潜在证据。
item.description:
LATEST: Lawyers for former Pres. Trump are seeking to delay the start of his New York hush money trial in order to allow them to review tens of thousands of pages of potential evidence recently disclosed by the Justice Department. https://t.co/9BqZI1pzUw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当局周五表示，一名新墨西哥州警察在高速公路上遭枪击身亡。一名枪击案嫌疑人仍在逃。
item.description:
A New Mexico State Police officer was shot and killed on a highway, authorities said Friday. A suspect in the shooting remains at-large. https://t.co/uCoh9IsQYo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）周五直接向拜登总统表示，讨论加沙问题和停火需求是他与拜登总统椭圆形办公室会晤的重点议题。
item.description:
Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar was direct with Pres. Biden on Friday that discussing Gaza and the need for a ceasefire was high on his list for their Oval Office meeting. https://t.co/l86AYjHeok

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最高法院周五制定了一项新的测试标准，用于确定政府雇员在社交媒体上采取的行动--如发布消息、删除评论或屏蔽用户--何时构成公务行为与个人行为。
item.description:
The Supreme Court on Friday laid out a new test for determining when actions taken by government employees on social media — such as posting messages, deleting comments or blocking users — constitute official business verses personal conduct. https://t.co/tYfrfjXDEU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 周四下午 4:45 左右，布鲁克林一辆向北行驶的 A 号列车上发生枪击事件，一名 36 岁的受害者伤势严重，但情况稳定。
item.description:
A 36-year-old shooting victim is in critical but stable condition following an incident that unfolded on a northbound A train in Brooklyn around 4:45 p.m. Thursday, the NYPD transit chief said. https://t.co/76bZopHmd8 pic.twitter.com/YjqCXXQpPm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 杰森-苏戴基斯（Jason Sudeikis）、汉娜-沃丁汉姆（Hannah Waddingham）和《泰德-拉索》（Ted Lasso）剧组的其他几位成员周四在第 35 届 GLAAD 媒体奖（GLAAD Media Awards）颁奖典礼的红地毯上重聚。
item.description:
Jason Sudeikis, Hannah Waddingham and several other members of the "Ted Lasso" cast reunited on the red carpet at the 35th GLAAD Media Awards Thursday. https://t.co/nnP8l6mWhp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 法国议会一致通过了一项法案，以遏制快速时尚对环境的影响，这标志着全球时尚产业向可持续发展迈出了重要一步。
item.description:
France’s parliament has unanimously approved a bill to curb the environmental impact of fast fashion, marking a significant step towards sustainability in the global fashion industry. https://t.co/uyYWBYiA4f

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 随着春季购房季的到来，越来越多急于出售房屋的房主降低了最初要价，以吸引潜在买家。
item.description:
More homeowners eager to sell their house are lowering their initial asking price in a bid to entice prospective buyers as the spring homebuying season gets going. https://t.co/tZRi20TFUB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的葬礼结束后的几天里，成千上万的人继续在莫斯科南部的公墓外排队，等待向他的墓地献花。
item.description:
For days after the funeral of the Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, thousands of people continued to line up outside the cemetery in southern Moscow waiting to lay flowers at his grave. https://t.co/RdWP7JmGu3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 📸:波兰一家蜡像馆因其名人肖像而走红，其中包括威廉王子和凯特王妃。
item.description:
📸: A wax museum in Poland has gone viral for its celebrity lookalike figures, including Prince William and Princess Kate.

Its previous works have included likenesses of Donald Trump, Hillary Clinton, Pope Francis and Mr. Bean. https://t.co/4Le1lcaNq2 pic.twitter.com/i5EuWsiHbA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 爆料：负责监督佐治亚州针对唐纳德-特朗普及其同案被告的选举干扰案的法官称，地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）或检察官内森-韦德（Nathan Wade）必须让位。
item.description:
BREAKING: The judge overseeing the Georgia election interference case against Donald Trump and his co-defendants says either DA Fani Willis or prosecutor Nathan Wade must step aside. https://t.co/dedcDgNt1S pic.twitter.com/kJ7gmaRUTx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：负责监督佐治亚州针对唐纳德-特朗普及其同案被告的选举干扰案的法官就要求富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）回避此案的努力做出了裁决。
item.description:
JUST IN: The judge overseeing the Georgia election interference case against Donald Trump and his co-defendants has issued a ruling on the effort to disqualify Fulton County DA Fani Willis from the case. https://t.co/nanqJYxZ0P

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 一名公交车司机救助了一名在密尔沃基繁忙街道上独自徘徊的小男孩，在警察将他与家人团聚之前，将他带到车上取暖：
item.description:
A bus driver came to the rescue of a young boy wandering alone on a busy Milwaukee street, bringing him on board to keep him warm before police reunited him with his family.

Watch: https://t.co/ycuRNkAOvk pic.twitter.com/E9X5LTWp8K

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: "他们做着普通的事情......却碰巧与连环杀手擦肩而过"。从悬案到关联案件连环杀手与五起袭击案有关
item.description:
"They were doing ordinary things ... and they just happened to cross the path of a serial killer."

From cold cases to connected: Serial predator linked to five attacks. https://t.co/jryO2vu2kc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: "沙特阿拉伯可以利用美国媒体对优秀体育故事的报道周期来挤掉那些负面报道"。LIV Golf 颇具争议的增长引发了对沙特 "体育洗白 "的质疑。
item.description:
"Saudi Arabia can use the media cycle of good sports stories in the United States to push out all those negative stories."

LIV Golf's controversial growth raises questions over Saudi 'sportswashing.' https://t.co/csDBryNRQt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 据报道，周五麦当劳在全球范围内出现系统故障，导致一些餐厅停业数小时，并引发了顾客在社交媒体上的投诉，该快餐连锁店称这是一次 "技术故障"，目前正在修复中：
item.description:
System failures at McDonald's were reported worldwide Friday, shuttering some restaurants for hours and leading to social media complaints from customers, in what the fast food chain called a “technology outage” that was being fixed.

Read more: https://t.co/GRRCxThNXP pic.twitter.com/sWmdm7EzLu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据洛根县警长办公室称，俄亥俄州莱克维尤市一夜之间遭受疑似龙卷风袭击，造成至少三人死亡。
item.description:
JUST IN: At least three people are dead after suspected tornadoes ripped through Lakeview, Ohio, overnight, according to Logan County Sheriff's Office.

Widespread damage has also been reported in Lakeview and the surrounding communities, officials say. https://t.co/PXrzyiVvmf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 气温的升高、积雪的减少和地面的变化迫使阿拉斯加历史悠久的艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛不得不适应不断变化的环境。
item.description:
Increased temperatures, lack of snow and ground changes have forced the Iditarod Trail Dog Sled Race, a longstanding Alaskan competition, to adapt to its changing environment. https://t.co/NoC8bdEqEe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 五年前的今天，一名枪手在新西兰克赖斯特彻奇的两座清真寺杀害了 51 人，并在 Facebook 上直播了这场大屠杀。
item.description:
Five years ago today, a gunman killed 51 people at two mosques in Christchurch, New Zealand, streaming the massacre live on Facebook.

Then-Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern announced a ban on all military-style, semi-automatic weapons days later. https://t.co/7EPFf9Itii pic.twitter.com/ZIv2pSuhxD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024
